name: Aquaticum Debrecen Thermal and Wellness Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just arrived from Aquaticum Debrecen Thermal and Wellness Hotel. It was a short holiday which could have been better (for the price). I have been to the water theme park before and thought that staying in this hotel was the most convenient way to spend 2 nights. I was wrong in only one thing: price/value.
reviews.title: At most 3 stars. At most!

reviews.text: Main focus for us: the rooms and the hotel were clean!
reviews.title: this is a 3 stars hotel

reviews.text: Parking is not free (~7 EUR/night) and the place is quite busy. Free and more spacious parking place would be better. The staff is helpful and do they best to navigate you empty places which is hard because of some strange guests who park one car into the place of two cars.
reviews.title: A great stay in Debrecen
Better for families
reviews.text: You have to go through a restaurant's "garden" to reach the thermal bath's main entrance. The building itself desperately needs a renovation. The reception is on the second floor which is strange but understandable. Reception staff is kind and helpful either at check-in or check-out. They give you RFID wrist watch for the spa, voucher for the welcome drink, towel card and a plastic (RFID) door key. I really don't know why can't one use the wrist watch to operate the room doors.

reviews.text: The main advantage this hotel has is that it has direct access via a glass tunnel to the Mediterranean aqua park, so you don't have to take your child out to freezing temperatures after a bath in winter time .
reviews.title: i'll be back in winter

reviews.text: The aqua park has a lot of facilities for children. It has a big children play room with lots of toys and a nice lady that watches the children. It has a first aid office, useful when you travel with children. The apartment was nicely separated, with separated toilet room, bath room, living room and bedroom. The living room is quite spacious. Friendly and helpful staff. Good restaurant. It also has children menus.
reviews.title: Lovely baths, property so-so
Nice hotel, good thermal baths, indoor aquapark
Aquaticum Termal and Wellness Hotel (Give it a try)
reviews.text: The four star Aquaticum Thermal and Wellness Hotel is situated in a conservation area on the edge of the great forest. The Hotel is decorated and maintained to a high standard. Book an apartment very good value. You can also book Fitness and Wellness packages. Staff are very friendly and helpfull most of them either speaking English or German. There an indoor swimming pool, indoor and outdoor thermal pools, a mediterranean water and sauna centre and in addition all the beauty and therapy treatments you could wish for. Hotel is approx 10 min tram ride from outside Hotel to the centre of Debrecen, or a 30min walk down a tree lined boulevard. Debrecen is a university town so there are lots of bars and resturants. Highly recommended, give it a try. I've booked again for 2007. Have a look at their website. www. aquaticum.hu

description: The Aquaticum Thermal and Wellness Hotel offers its guests comfortable rooms and suites with air-conditioning and balconies. The Wellness Island is located in the heart third floor and is ready to provide wellness treatments for the guests. For those needing to relax and refresh, there are more than 60 wellness services and Eastern style movement-based exercise programs. The Aqauaticum Mediterranean Water Center provides an all day long relaxation and fun for all generations.
